tn.text: AT: "I will be kind ... was kind"
"comfort"

tn.ref: Do you think that David is honoring your father because he has sent men to comfort you?
tn.text: AT: "You should not think that David is honoring your father because he has sent men to comfort you." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.text: AT: "Surely his servants come to you to explore the land in order to overthrow it." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
